summary: FUEL LINES FROM BOTTOM OF TANK ON MY FLTRSEI STARTED LEAKING ONTO THE ENGINE AND PRIMARY CASE. LEAK WAS SLOW AT FIRST BUT WHEN I PUT MY HAND UNDER THE "TAPS" AND TOUCHED THEM THE LEAK GOT IMMEDIATELY WORSE. I WAS TOLD BY THE H-D SHOP PERSONAL THAT THIS TYPE OF PROBLEM SEEMED TO BE CONSISTENT WITH THE 2000  EFI MODELS. IT SEEMS IT WAS SOME TYPE OF VALVE THAT WAS LEAKING INSIDE OF THE GAS TANK.*JB
